headline: Public Company COO & CFO
summary:
A highly driven, results-oriented leadership professional with 25 years of experience ranging from product development to acquisitions in fast-paced and competitive technology environments.  A well rounded and creative hands-on leader with a solid track record of successfully developing, communicating, and executing business strategies.  Proven ability to effectively build, influence, and coordinate large, cross-functional teams with unique priorities to deliver on a common objective. 

Specialties: A highly adaptive leader and problem solver. Major strengths include a solid technical background, critical business thinking, an intense analytical nature, and the ability to extract and distill product ideas, strategies, and executable plans for both new and existing markets, and deliver positive results.

experiences.title: CFO & COO
experiences.description: A hands-on operational leader and problem solver.  Successfully grew the company for over a decade with a revenue CAGR in the mid double digits off of the Company's balance sheet.  Successfully led our IPO in October 2021 and honed our skills as a publicly-traded Company for several years before successfully selling to strategic buyer, IFS, in August 2024 for $1 billion.
